verses.name: Leviticus 4:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 4:2
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If a soul shall sin through ignorance against any of the commandments of the Lord concerning things which ought not to be done, and shall do against any of them:

verses.name: Leviticus 4:3
verses.text: If the priest that is anointed do sin according to the sin of the people; then let him bring for his sin, which he hath sinned, a young bullock without blemish unto the Lord for a sin offering.
